column4: some of you guys are incredibly rude.  Some of us are new to linux in particular, to ubuntu.  We're not all computer nerds with nothing better to do with our time than get geeked out by our machines in mommies basement.  Get a life you guys, buy some beer, get laid
no one will help.  there are really rude responses flying all around
i had a quick scroll up and couldn't see anything really offensive
